name: Crystal Brilliance
desc: You can only control 1 "Crystal Brilliance". "Crystal Beast" monsters you control gain ATK equal to their original DEF. If a "Crystal Beast" card(s) is placed in your Spell & Trap Zone (even during the Damage Step): You can send this face-up card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Crystal Beast" monster from your hand or GY, also any damage you take this turn is halved.

card_sets.set_name: Structure Deck: Legend of the Crystal Beasts
